amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds made available in the Act from being used to fund the operations of the Medicaid Commission (established on May 19, 2005, and chartered under section 222 of the Public Health Service Act and the Federal Advisory Committee Act).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 237 (Roll no. 310).
